string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Do you enjoy spending time alone?
Are you open to trying new experiences?
Do you find it easy to express your emotions?
Are you a good listener?
Do you often experience feelings of anxiety?
Are you easily influenced by other people\'s opinions?
Do you believe in the power of positive thinking?
Are you good at managing your time?
Do you believe in the existence of fate or destiny?
Are you comfortable with taking risks?
Do you find it easy to forgive others?
Are you a good judge of character?
Do you trust your intuition?
Are you comfortable with giving and receiving feedback?
Do you believe in the concept of soulmates?
Are you a good problem solver?
Are you comfortable confronting others when necessary?
Do you have a strong sense of self-confidence?
Are you able to handle stress effectively?
Do you believe that people can change for the better?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: Yes
Rather yes than no.
I don\'t know.
Rather no than yes.
No.
